title: DOMINION, a Great Loss

embed.description: We launched Dominion more than four years ago as an alternative game mode designed to challenge players with fast-paced skirmishes, capture-and-hold gameplay, and different skills to master. Back then, we all thought games needed sequels and expansions and all sorts of extra things. It turns out most of those aren't quite as mandatory as we figured.

body:
So without further ado, Dominion is being guillotined, cremated and its dust scattered to the wind.

Many sore hearts go with it as League offers rewards to those who were loyal to it almost 3 years ago on the NA servers, without giving those recent recruits of our beloved OCE server, a chance to know of its existence.

Goodbye oh joyous nights of Hide and Seek; your ability in teaching many people the benefits of hiding and duking within the brushes will never go unforgotten.

The purpose and existence of custom games on League will finally come to a close as the Riot company closes its heart and wallet.

We will miss you Dominion. <3
